T02TD2138E:197b-1: shr'i a'ar+ya ba lo ki te shva ra sapt'a ksha ra s'a dha nam /
T02TD2138E:197b-3: 'phags pa sbyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yi ge bdun pa'i sgrub thabs /
T02TD2138E:197b-4: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ye shes 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2138E:197b-5: dpal ldan bde chen ye shes sku mdog thugs rje 'bar bas rol pa'i tshul //
T02TD2138E:197b-6: shes rab mchog dang gnyis med snyoms zhugs dngos grub gzhi gyur cing //
T02TD2138E:197b-7: mchog drug lha mo'i sbyi bos zhabs btud yang dag dkyil 'khor chen po'i bdag / spyan ras gzigs dbang mgon po nyid rtag gus pas rab tu btud par bya //
T02TD2138E:197b-8: rnal 'byor chen po gdong sogs dag byas bsil zhid rab 'byam dben pa yi //
T02TD2138E:197b-9: gnas khang yid dga' sna tshogs me tog chal par bkram pa'am //
T02TD2138E:197b-10: yang na rab 'jigs phug dang dur khrod lha gnas chu 'gram shing gcig drung //
T02TD2138E:197b-11: brtse bas sems brlan rtse gcig yid byed chos kun mkha' 'drar bsam par bya //
T02TD2138E:197b-12: de rjes snying dbus nyi ma la gnas h'um //
T02TD2138E:197b-13: mkha' 'dra'i mgon can 'od zer zab mo yis //
T02TD2138E:198a-1: tshogs bla ma lhar bcas dgug nas ni //
T02TD2138E:198a-2: mchod tshogs cho ga ji bzhin mkhas pas spyad //
T02TD2138E:198a-3: de nas yang chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rnam par thar ba zab mo mngon du bya ste /
T02TD2138E:198a-4: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'a tma ko nyham /
T02TD2138E:198a-5: slar ni sngon gyi smon lam dang //
T02TD2138E:198a-6: snying rje chen po'i shugs kyis ni //
T02TD2138E:198a-7: mkha' la glo bur sbrin bzhin du //
T02TD2138E:198a-8: sngags pas lha mchog rnam par 'phrul //
T02TD2138E:198a-10: sdo dang dmar dang dkar dang ser //
T02TD2138E:198a-11: gzhu dbyibs rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang //
T02TD2138E:198a-12: gru gsum me dbung 'bar ba nyid //
T02TD2138E:198a-13: chu gter phung po zlum po dang //
T02TD2138E:198a-14: de bzhin gru bzhi gser gyi dkyil 'khor dang //
T02TD2138E:198a-15: de steng sna tshogs mdog gsum yig / yongs gyur ri dbang gru bzhi cha //
T02TD2138E:198a-16: de nas dkyil 'khor mchog bsgom bya //
T02TD2138E:198a-17: de'i rjes la srung ba'i 'khor lo bsgom par bya /
T02TD2138E:198a-18: aom mi di n'i badzri bha ba bandha h'um /
T02TD2138E:198a-19: aom badzra pr'a kar h'um bam h'um /
T02TD2138E:198a-20: aom badzra panytsa ra h'um bam h'um /
T02TD2138E:198a-21: aom badzra bi ta na h'um kham h'um /
T02TD2138E:198a-22: aom badzra sa ra dz'a la tram sam tram /
T02TD2138E:198a-23: aom badzra dzv'a la aa na l'arka h'um h'um h'um /
T02TD2138E:198a-24: sngags 'di dag nyid kyis me ri dang /
T02TD2138E:198a-25: rdo rje ra ba la sogs pas rnam par bcad do //
T02TD2138E:198a-26: de dbus padmar 'khor lo la gnas ram yig las byung nyi dkyil du //
T02TD2138E:198a-27: aa dang ka sogs zla ba nyi phrag rdor sems gtso bo h'um bsams la //
T02TD2138E:198a-28: spro zhing bsdu ba'i 'od tshogs zhu bas spyan ras gzigs bzhad yum bcas ni //
T02TD2138E:198a-29: chu zla'i gzugs ltar dang bas rtse gcig rtag tu yang dag mnyam gzhag bya //
T02TD2138E:198a-30: de la dpal chen zhal gsum mdzes //
T02TD2138E:198a-31: g-yas dkar g-yon dmar dbus mthing ga / sbyan gsum padma bye bas mdzes //
T02TD2138E:198a-32: phyag drug rnam par rol ba'o //
T02TD2138E:198a-33: dang po'i phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pas ni yum la 'khyud pa'o //
T02TD2138E:198a-34: gnyis pa gnyis kyis mi'i pags pa bshus ma thag pa bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2138E:198a-35: tha ma'i g-yas dang g-yon na mchan khung na rtse gsum dang thod pa khrag gis bkang pa dang kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa nyid do //
T02TD2138E:198a-36: mi thong dkar po dang lag pa'i mkhrig ma dang rdo rje dang rus pa'i phreng ba nyid dang /
T02TD2138E:198a-37: me tog sna tshogs pa'i chun 'phyang gis dbu rab tu brgyan to //
T02TD2138E:198a-38: de bzhin du rin po che dang rus pa dang /
T02TD2138E:198a-39: gdug pa can gyi rgyan du mas ni sku la brgyan pa'o //
T02TD2138E:198a-40: zhabs g-yon brkyang bas ni dbang phyug chen po'i steng nas mnan to //
T02TD2138E:198a-41: g-yas brkyang bas ni lha mo chen mo'i brang phrag nas brdzis pa'o //
T02TD2138E:198b-0: de'i dbus skra ral ba'i cod pan @198b dmar ser bsgyings pa nyid au dumw'a ra'i me tog gis mtshan pa ni khyad par ro //
T02TD2138E:198b-1: de'i mdun ru yum dmar mo sgeg mo lang tsho phun sum tshogs ma g-yas g-yon mnga' gzhu 'dzin pas 'khyud pa //
T02TD2138E:198b-2: mchog tu dga' bas rnam par myos pa'o //
T02TD2138E:198b-3: de nas 'khor lo rtsibs drug la //
T02TD2138E:198b-4: rdo rje lha mo drug dgod bya ;
T02TD2138E:198b-5: / shar nas brtsams ba'i rim gyis su //
T02TD2138E:198b-6: me long la ni byad gzugs bzhin //
T02TD2138E:198b-7: phat las skyes pa'i he ru ka ma sngon mo dang //
T02TD2138E:198b-8: h'um las yongs gyur rdo rje 'jigs ma ser mo nyid //
T02TD2138E:198b-9: ha las rab grub 'jigs byed drag mo dmar mo dang //
T02TD2138E:198b-10: de bzhin ha las rdo rje dbang byed ljang gu ma //
T02TD2138E:198b-11: hr'i: las rnam bltas rdo rje drag mo dung mdog nyid //
T02TD2138E:198b-12: aom las mngon grub rdo rje mkha' 'gro dkar mo ste //
T02TD2138E:198b-13: 'di dag cig car zhal gcig phyag bzhi g-yang gzhi dang /
T02TD2138E:198b-14: da ma ru dang dril bu legs bsnams 'dud pa'o //
T02TD2138E:198b-15: gtso bo dang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i lha chen po //
T02TD2138E:198b-16: 'di dag ni thams cad kyang gzhon nu mtshan dang dpe byad 'bar ba dang /
T02TD2138E:198b-17: phyogs gos can mi mgo'i phreng ba'i do shal dang /
T02TD2138E:198b-18: yi dags dang nyi ma'i gdan la rnam par gnas pa //
T02TD2138E:198b-19: me dpung 'bar ba'i nad na sku gsung thugs shin tu rol pa'i bdag nyid phyag rgya lngas brgyan pa /
T02TD2138E:198b-20: dngos grub thams cad ster ba'i don du brtson pas bzhengs bar bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2138E:198b-22: bdag snying sa bon las 'phros zer gyis ye shes 'khor lo bkug nas ni //
T02TD2138E:198b-23: rang lus legs bcug tshul bzhin bcing bya gnyis med rol pas dgyes bya zhing //
T02TD2138E:198b-24: lam mam pam tam kham zhes bya bas khams lnga byin brlabs de rjes nyid //
T02TD2138E:198b-25: aom aom hri hom h'um gi yi ges phung sogs gzhug / de bzhin du bhr'um h'um aam kham dang ham ham yi ge rnams kyis kyang //
T02TD2138E:198b-26: skye mched yongs su sbyangs nas ni //
T02TD2138E:198b-27: chog ji bzhin go cha bgo //
T02TD2138E:198b-33: phat ham yab kyi go cha'o //
T02TD2138E:198b-34: aom bam ham yom hrim mo hrem hrim hum h'um phat phat yum gyi go cha'o //
T02TD2138E:198b-35: aom a'a:h'um sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab pa'o //
T02TD2138E:198b-36: de nas mgon po sbyan drangs la //
T02TD2138E:198b-37: dbang bskur mchog gis dbang mchog nod //
T02TD2138E:198b-38: bla ma'i man ngag ji bzhin du //
T02TD2138E:198b-39: cho ga'i rim pas shes par bya //
T02TD2138E:198b-40: dpag med mchod pa'i lha tshogs kyis //
T02TD2138E:198b-41: mchod bya bdud rtsi myang bar bya //
T02TD2138E:198b-42: ting nge 'dzin la rab brtan pas //
T02TD2138E:199a-0: @199a * // gsang sngags rgyal po bzla bar bya //
T02TD2138E:199a-1: aom hr'i: ha ha h'um h'um phat /
T02TD2138E:199a-2: de nas dag pa rtogs bya ba //
T02TD2138E:199a-3: dran dang brtson 'grus dga' ba dang //
T02TD2138E:199a-4: shin tu sbyangs dag ting nge 'dzin //
T02TD2138E:199a-5: btang snyoms byang chub lha rim bzhin //
T02TD2138E:199a-6: pha rol phyin drug rnam dag phyir //
T02TD2138E:199a-7: rgyan drug thabs dang shes rab kyi //
T02TD2138E:199a-8: rnam dag brtan phyir yab dang yum //
T02TD2138E:199a-9: dbyer med phyir ni snyoms par zhugs //
T02TD2138E:199a-10: bar skabs kyi nye bar spyad pa gtor ma sbyin pa ni //
T02TD2138E:199a-11: dngos grub nye ba'i phyir te /
T02TD2138E:199a-12: rnal 'byor zab mo la bshad pa'i //
T02TD2138E:199a-13: man ngag gis ni mchod sbyin bya //
T02TD2138E:199a-14: gsang chen sngags dang phyag rgyar bcas //
T02TD2138E:199a-16: aom aa ralli ho dza: h'um bam ho:/
T02TD2138E:199a-17: badzra d'a ki ni sam ya stvam dri shya ho: spyan drang ba'o //
T02TD2138E:199a-18: aom kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi /
T02TD2138E:199a-19: sarba ya ksha r'a ksha sa bh'u ta pre ta bi sh'a tsa aun man da aa pa sma ra d'a ki n+ya da ya ai mam ba lim gri hnam tu ma ma sarba siddhi mme pra yatstsha ntu ya the bam ya theeshtam bhu dza th'a bi ba tha ji ghra th'a /
T02TD2138E:199a-21: ma ma sarba ka ta ya /
T02TD2138E:199a-22: satshu kha bi bri ddha ye sva h'a /
T02TD2138E:199a-24: zla ba gsum du 'bum phrag gsum ma gnyis sam yang na gcig / mi tshig ma 'dres brtson pas ting 'dzin brtan byas na //
T02TD2138E:199a-25: 'jig rten dbang phyug bde chen 'khor lo lha mchog nyid //
T02TD2138E:199a-26: tho rangs dus tshe rmi lam mngon sum zhal ston gyur /
T02TD2138E:199a-27: dpal spyan ras gzigs ye ge bdun pa'i sgrub thabs /
T02TD2138E:199a-28: gnubs lo ts'a ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o//
